subject: Basketball
NBA Championship
lead_paragraph: When the San Antonio Spurs meet the Miami Heat in the N.B.A. finals, Tim Duncan, Dwyane Wade and others will have a chance to add to substantial jewelry collections.
snippet: When the San Antonio Spurs meet the Miami Heat in the N.B.A. finals, Tim Duncan, Dwyane Wade and others will have a chance to add to substantial jewelry collections.
